price: Dájúdájú àwọn ẹni rere, wọn yóò máa mu omi kan nínú ife. Ohun tí A pòpọ̀ mọ́ (omi náà) ni káfúrà.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارَ يَشۡرَبُونَ مِن كَأۡسٖ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: inna al-abrāra yashrabūna min kasin kāna mizājuhā kāfūran
